subject: Maritime Accidents and Safety
Deaths (Fatalities)
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: Andrew Ashman, 49, was reefing a sail on the IchorCoal around during the first leg from London to Brazil when he was struck by “the mainsheet and possibly the boom,” a statement on the race’s website said.
snippet: Andrew Ashman, 49, was reefing a sail on the IchorCoal around during the first leg from London to Brazil when he was struck by “the mainsheet and possibly the boom,” a statement on the race’s website said.
